# {APP_NAME} - Deployment Instructions

## Quick Deploy (5 minutes)

### 1. Supabase Setup (2 min)
1. Go to https://supabase.com
2. Create new project (free tier)
3. SQL Editor ‚Üí Run the database schema
4. Settings ‚Üí API ‚Üí Copy URL + anon key

### 2. Backend Deploy (Render) (2 min)
1. Push code to GitHub
2. Go to https://render.com
3. New ‚Üí Web Service
4. Connect your repo
5. Root Directory: `backend`
6. Build Command: `pip install -r requirements.txt`
7. Start Command: `uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT`
8. Add environment variables:
   - SUPABASE_URL=your_url
   - SUPABASE_KEY=your_key

### 3. Frontend Deploy (Netlify) (1 min)
1. Go to https://netlify.com
2. New site from Git
3. Base directory: `frontend`
4. Build command: `npm run build`
5. Publish directory: `dist`
6. Add environment variable:
   - VITE_API_URL=https://your-backend.onrender.com

‚úÖ Done! Your app is live at:
- Frontend: https://{APP_NAME}.netlify.app
- Backend: https://{APP_NAME}.onrender.com
